attributes.action: To implement the boundary changes as detailed in the Boundary Commission for England's Fifth Report, laid before parliament on 27 February 2007, prior to the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Boundary Commission for England's Fifth Report is currently before Parliament. Another general election based on the current boundaries would give the current administration, if the major parties obtained an equal share of the vote, a majority of at least 16 MPs. Holding the next general election prior to the boundary changes being implemented would be undemocratic.
